description:
Loosely based on the Kosmo chassis from his YouTube channel.

I have multiple versions to fit your needs. 
 Chassis Cab
 Stake Bed
 Dump Bed
 Box Bed
 Mobile Base
 Flat Bed
 Rollback (Slide Version)
 Rollback (Arm Version)

 All my items are mod free. All vanilla parts with no glitches or hacks being used. All downloads have been tested in creative and survival modes. For importing workshop items to survival some pretty good youtube tutorials are available. 

Vehicle Details-
 This download is for the T950 Chassis Cab version. Was the T750 just not heavy duty enough for you? The T950 is the same awesome truck as the T750 but with much more loading power. This version comes with no bed or utility on the back allowing you to easily make your own to fit your needs. If you have issues getting out or want to get out faster just remove the sunroof. Truck has storage on both sides. One fuel container on each side for each engine and 2 large crates on each side. Rear suspension is a live axle set up with quad offroad suspension on each main axle. Load axle is a dual suspension setup. Driver and passenger doors open as well as the hood. Like a real Chassis Cab the suspension is going to be very hard until you put a load on it. If you plan on just using the vehicle as is you may want to soften the rear suspension. Only drop the rear load axle if you have a heavy load. Otherwise you get massive wheelspin.

Vehicle Functions-
1: Doors
2: Hood
3: Horn
4: Main Lights
5: Aux Lights
6: Load Axle
7: Not Used
8: Not Used
9: Not Used
0: Not Used
name: Locura T950 Chassis Cab
